Changelog
=========

0.2 (2010-07-19)
----------------

- add pubdate for feed entries, showing the date using
  toLocaleDateString
  [hplocher]
- add even/odd classes
  [hplocher]
- add compatibility with Plone 3
  (use jQuery instead of $, as $ is undefined in Plone 3)
  [hplocher]

0.1 (2010-07-16)
----------------

- Initial release
